org.odftoolkit.simple.text.list

Class OutLineDecorator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.odftoolkit.simple.text.list.OutLineDecorator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ListDecorator

    public class OutLineDecorator
extends Object
implements ListDecorator
    OutLineDecorator is an implementation of the ListDecorator interface, decorates a given List as a special number list with outline. User can extend this class and realize their own list and list item style. For example, set a specifies list item with red color.

    An OutLineDecorator can be reused in the same Document.

    Since:
    0.4
